Hyundai Elantra 2010 Back Seat Removal How To Tutorial. Remove backseat to install covers or just to replace them completely. As you can tell, this one needed a replacement BAD. 

You only need one size ratchet or a skateboard tool. Takes about 10 minutes to remove entire back seat bottom and tops.
